extension_description.message: Sync Tab Groups is an easy way to manage all your tabs. You group, organize, search and active them easily.

contextmenu_preferences.description: Open Preferences from the shortcuts Menu

open_window_group.description: Hover help for open in new window button

show_tabs.description: Hover help for show tabs in group button

hide_tabs.description: Hover help for hide tabs in group button

undo_removing.description: Hover help for undo removing button

undo_closing.description: Hover help for undo closing button

force_removing.description: Hover help for force removing button

force_closing.description: Hover help for force closing button

open_tab.description: Hover help for open tab button

close_tab.message: Remove Tab and close if opened
close_tab.description: Hover help for open tab button

move_tab_group.description: Name of the menu in the context (right click on tab)

new_window.message: A new opened window creates a new group automatically.

remove_empty_groups.message: 自動刪除沒有分頁的群組。

new_private_window.message: A new opened Private window creates a new group automatically.

close_private_window.message: Remove the group in a private window, when this window is closed.

sync_pinned_tabs.message: Add pinned tabs inside the groups (If no, they won't be closed when you switch group)

bookmark_help_folder.message: Bookmarks are saved in OtherBookmarks/SyncTabGroups by default.

bookmark_help_moving.message: For changing the root location, move the SyncTabGroups folder anywhere in your bookmarks.

bookmark_help_session.message: Session name is the subfolder name where bookmarks are saved for this computer.

bookmark_help_precaution.message: Do not have another SyncTabGroups folder.

save_bookmarks_automatically.message: 自動將群組存成書籤(每30秒)

import_export_help_added.message: Imported groups are added as closed groups

import_export_help_support.message: Import supports: Sync Tab Groups and Tab Groups json file.

privileged_url_help_reason.message: Sync Tab Groups can't open directly privileged URLs for security reason:

open_url_help_method_part_2.message: Paste the URL in the address bar

privileged_url_help_warning.message: Warning: those URLs are closed automatically by Firefox when the extension is updated or disabled.

command_description_focus_next_group.message: Focus window with next group opened.

command_description_focus_previous_group.message: Focus window with previous group opened.

command_description_remove_group_swtich.message: Close and remove the current group in window.

command_description__execute_browser_act.message: 開啟 Open Sync Tab Group 選單。

icon_option.message: Use white icon instead of black

show_tabs_number.message: 在群組標題後顯示分頁數量。

allow_global_shortcuts.message: Allow extension shortcuts from anywhere in the browser

show_title_window.message: 在視窗標題前顯示群組名稱。

bookmarks_weak_help.message: Bookmarks auto-save can be very problematic. I would recommend to not use it until I have fixed it

label_sort_accessed.description: Name of sorting in select in option page

unpin_tab.description: In context menu on tab in menu

pin_tab.description: In context menu on tab in menu

open_group.message: Click to switch to this group in the current window.
open_group.description: Hover help for open group click

expand_all_groups.description: Hover help the button expanding all groups (see tabs)

reduce_all_groups.description: Hover help for button reducing all groups (hide tabs)

synchronized_window.description: Label for group visible in the popup

unsynchronized_window.description: Status in Mainbar (Menu) when a group is invisible

contextmenu_backup.description: Right click on extension icon, the title for doing a backup.

options_about_start.message: Welcome to Sync Tab Groups! I highly recommend you to start checking the different options. You will make Sync Tab Groups fit your expectation. Also, you will understand how to use the extension well, as each option is explained.

options_about_further.message: For further information, check the guide (link in the navigation bar) on the Sync Tab Groups Website.

options_about_enjoy.message: I hope you are loving your experience with Sync Tab Groups. If so, don't hesitate to add a nice review on the extension download page for sharing it.
options_about_enjoy.description: Message in the about section of the Preferences

options_about_contribute.message: Beyond to use it, you can contribute. Like finding bugs, suggesting great new features to add or simply translating it in your language. For any reasons, don't hesitate to contact me.
options_about_contribute.description: Message in the about section of the Preferences

options_about_dev.message: Sync Tab Groups is an extension I am developing in my free time. I am doing everything to provide you the best extension. For those who came across bugs, I apologize for the disagreement.
options_about_dev.description: Message in the about section of the Preferences

options_behaviors_help_invisible.message: New windows opened without Sync Tab Groups are Invisible.

options_behaviors_help_visible_new.message: New windows opened without Sync Tab Groups are Visible as a new unnamed group.

options_behaviors_help_change_visibility.message: Any window can be specifically changed from/to visible/invisible from the Menu. (button at the bottom left)

options_behaviors_pinned_excluded.description: Pinned Tabs are not part of a group.

options_behaviors_pinned_excluded_notpar.message: 釘選的分頁不隸屬於任何群組。

options_behaviors_pinned_excluded_switch.message: Switching/closing actions don't impact the pinned tabs.

options_behaviors_pinned_excluded_usecas.message: Use case: Global Tabs (Mail tab, Music tab...)

options_behaviors_pinned_included.description: Pinned are saved in the group

options_behaviors_pinned_included_part.message: 釘選的分頁歸類在群組裡。

options_behaviors_pinned_included_switch.message: Switching/closing actions close and save the pinned tabs in the group.

options_behaviors_pinned_included_usecas.message: Use case: Important tabs for the group.

options_behaviors_tabsopening_discarded.description: Tabs are not fully loaded on opening

options_behaviors_tabsopening_discarded_.message: Tabs are not fully loaded on opening.
The tabs are only loaded once you active (click/focus) them. After, they stay loaded.

options_behaviors_tabsopening_full_loade.message: Tabs are completely loaded on opening.

options_behaviors_tabsopening_full_heavi.message: 需要較多記憶體與網路傳輸。

options_behaviors_tabsopening_limits_tem.message: Temporary data (forms...) added before tabs were closed are lost. (Limited by the browser)

options_behaviors_tabsopening_limits_his.message: 分頁紀錄無法復原。(受限於瀏覽器)

options_behaviors_private_visible.message: New private windows opened without Sync Tab Groups are visible as a new private groups.

options_behaviors_private_groups.message: Groups opened in private windows are private as well.

options_behaviors_private_notsaved.message: 隱私群組不會存到電腦裡

options_behaviors_private_autoremoved.message: 一個隱私群組關閉時將自動被刪除。

options_behaviors_private_restart.message: 重啟瀏覽器將關閉並刪除所有隱私群組。

options_behaviors_private_invisible_crea.message: New private windows opened without Sync Tab Groups are Invisible.

options_behaviors_private_changestate.message: Any private window can be specifically changed from/to private/invisible from the Menu.

options_settings.description: Option section for the groups settings (behavior)

options_interface.description: Option section for the groups interface

options_interface_windows.description: Option subsection for the groups interface

options_interface_groups.description: Option subsection for the groups interface

options_interface_sortexplanation_custom.message: Custom: Drag & Drop to position your groups

options_interface_sortexplanation_last.message: Last Accessed: Sort by last utilisation

options_groups.description: Option section for the groups data

options_groups_backup_behavior_download.message: Automatic download of a file with all your groups. (except private ones)

options_groups_backup_behavior_invisible.message: The download is invisible in the download history.

options_groups_backup_behavior_distinctf.message: Each specific timer is saved in a distinct file.

options_groups_backup_behavior_overwritt.message: However, the same timer will overwrite its previous back up.

options_groups_backup_location_subfolder.message: Done in the subfolder '$FOLDER$' in your browser download folder.

options_groups_backup_location_restictio.message: The browser restricts it to be inside the browser download folder, so you can't change the location.

options_groups_backup_timer_start.message: Timers start when the extension is launched or the back up is enabled, and back up when the time indicated is over.

options_groups_backup_timer_done.message: The save is done when the time indicated is over.

options_groups_backup_timer_reset.message: Timers reset to 0, when you restart the browser, disable the back up option or disable the extension.

options_groups_backup_manual_button.message: From the shortcuts menu (Right click on the extension icon

options_groups_backup_manual_file.message: Saved in a distinct file, called manual, overwritten as well.

options_groups_backup_every.description: See options_groups_backup_t_..., a space is automatically added after

options_groups_cleaning_removeall_warnin.message: 一旦完成，你將無法回復你的郡組！

change_window_invisible.message: Click for making the group invisible (removed)
change_window_invisible.description: Hover help for button in the bottom left of the menu

change_window_visible.message: Click for making the window visible (added as new group)
change_window_visible.description: Hover help for button in the bottom left of the menu

open_manager.message: Open Tab with the Groups Manager
open_manager.description: Hover help for button in the bottom of the menu

group_manager.description: Tab name where you can organize your groups

group_manager_single_button.description: Button in Groups Manager for showing only one side

group_manager_split_button.description: Button in Groups Manager for showing 2 sides

options_shortcuts_global.description: Shortcuts available from anywhere in the browser

notification_update_title.message: Sync Tab Groups 已更新版本
notification_update_title.description: Title in the notification displayed when the extension is updated

notification_update_message.description: Message in the notification displayed when the extension is updated

options_shortcuts_navigation.description: Shortcuts available from the groups interface (Popup & manager)

options_shortcuts_navigation_allow.message: Allow navigation shortcuts from the groups interface

command_description_general_down.message: 下一個(或第一個)群組/分頁

command_description_general_up.message: 上一個(或最後一個)群組/分頁

command_description_general_insert.message: Create a new group (accept name with enter)

command_description_group_shift_enter.message: Open the group in a new window (or focus)

command_description_group_backspace.message: Undo the close or remove action

command_description_group_ctrl_e.message: Edit the name of the group (enter to accept) (Shift+Backspace to cancel)

command_description_group_shift_up.message: Move the group to the position before (if custom sort selected)

command_description_group_shift_down.message: Move the group to the position after (if custom sort selected)

command_description_tab_shift_enter.message: Open the tab in a new window (or focus)

command_description_tab_space.message: Focus the parent group (then press again to hide the tabs)

command_description_tab_ctrl_enter.message: Open a similar tab in the current window

command_description_tab_shift_p.message: 釘選/取消釘選 分頁

command_description_tab_shift_up.message: Move the tab to the position before

command_description_tab_shift_down.message: Move the tab to the position after

command_description_addbutton_enter.message: Accept the name and create the group

options_behaviors_tabsopening_recommenda.message: All tabs unloaded are closed when the extension is disabled, uninstalled or updated. (Chrome only)
The button `$BUTTON$` load all the tabs (one by one) not opened yet and discard them with the browser method.

button.example: Title of the button in this section (see options_behaviors_tabsopening_reload)

options_behaviors_tabsopening_recommenda.message: The loading tabs action is done automatically before an automatic update of the extension. (Chrome only)

options_behaviors_tabsopening_confirm_re.message: Do you want to load all the tabs in extension discarded mode ?

options_behaviors_tabsopening_nothing_re.message: There is no tab in extension discarded mode.

options_remove_groups_confirm.message: 你確定要刪除所有群組嗎？

selector_select_none.message: 取消選取所有分頁和群組
